name: Berimbau Chámou Você
lyrics:
Berimbau tocou bem forte em frente da enfantaria,
pra chámar São Bento Grande tu tocou cavalaria

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

Berimbau tocou bem forte na ladeira da Lapinhá,
Berimbau tocou bem forte na ladeira da Lapinhá
pra chámar São Bento Grande vou cantar a ladainhá…

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau chámou você,
oh dim dim dim dim dim berimbau tocou assim

translations.text:
Berimbau played very hard in front of the girl,
For the church of São Bento Grande you played the cavalry.

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so

Berimbau played very hard on the slope of Lapinha,
Berimbau played very strongly in the slope of the Lapinhá
I'm going to sing the litany ...

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so

Oh ie, ie, ie berimbau called you,
Oh dim dim dim dim berimbau played so
